git checkout -b.url: Creating a new branch is safe.

git checkout --orphan.url: Creating an orphan branch is safe.

git restore --staged.url: Unstaging files is safe; it does not discard working tree changes.

git clean -n.url: Dry run only shows what would be removed without deleting anything.

git clean --dry-run.url: Dry run only shows what would be removed without deleting anything.

git push --force-with-lease.url: Force-with-lease checks that the remote has not been updated before pushing, preventing accidental overwrites.
